scripts.reset:next: rm -rf app/node_modules app/yarn.lock app/package-lock.json && yarn i
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "nextjs",python -c bgBlack,bgBlue -k "npm run dev:next" "npm run server:dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "nextjs",python -c bgBlack,bgBlue -k "npm run start:next" "npm run server:start"
